argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | op1cl.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | op1cl.u | |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( lub ` K ) = ( lub ` K ) |
| 4 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_p1val | |- ( K e. OP -> .1. = ( ( lub ` K ) ` B ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_id | |- ( K e. OP -> K e. OP ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( glb ` K ) = ( glb ` K ) |
| 7 | 1, 3, 6 | #P_op01dm | |- ( K e. OP -> ( B e. dom ( lub ` K ) /\ B e. dom ( glb ` K ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_simpld | |- ( K e. OP -> B e. dom ( lub ` K ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 5, 8 | #P_lubcl | |- ( K e. OP -> ( ( lub ` K ) ` B ) e. B ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( K e. OP -> .1. e. B ) |
